entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
